From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

14 more messages this month and we will have tripled the previous 
record (set last month) for number of messages posted in one month.  
We're not that far off (less than 10) from the total number of 
messages this month surpassing the total number of messages posted in 
the 6 previous months.

I sent an email to Tom Ricket asking him to update the FS Games 
website to include the correct link for this group and posting info 
about a possible tournament.

he replied:

.. actually, we're shifting a whole bunch of stuff at the web-site .. 
so 
I'll try to pack everything up, then get it set back within the week, 
with 
the new information.

Thanks!

--Tom
